com.readytalk.swt.effects

Class ResizeEffect.ResizeEffectBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.readytalk.swt.effects.ResizeEffect.ResizeEffectBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    ResizeEffect

    public static class ResizeEffect.ResizeEffectBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder used to create and customize a ResizeEffect.
    Note: You need to either provide a current/target Size (or Height, Width), Location (or X, Y) or Bounds for the Effect to do anything useful.

    • Constructor Summary

      ResizeEffect.ResizeEffectBuilder()

      • build

        public ResizeEffect build()
                   throws InvalidEffectArgumentException
        Build the ResizeEffect given the options set in the Builder.
        Returns:
        A ResizeEffect
        Throws:
        InvalidEffectArgumentException - If you forget to call setResizeable()
